description: The response to the invocation of the add-on. The most common response will contain a navigation for cards - e.g. pushing a card to render content.

notification.description: Card action which displays a notification in the host app.

text.description: Plain text to display for the notification, without html tags.

popToRoot.description: Card stack pops all card off except the root card.

pop.description: Card stack pops one card off.

popToCard.description: Card stack pops all cards above the specified card with given card name.

pushCard.description: A card to push on top of the stack, which will be shown to end users.

updateCard.description:
Card stack updates the top card with a new card, preserving filled form
fields values. For non-equivalent field, the value is dropped.

action.description: Google Workspace add-on response to interact with the end user. The most common interaction is to render a card with a navigation.

navigations.description: Specify the navigation within the card stack.

link.description: Immediately open the target link in a new tab or a popup.

notification.description: Display a notification to the end-user.

action.description: Google Workspace add-on response to interact with the end user. The most common interaction is to render a card with a navigation.

hostAppAction.description: Actions handled by individual host apps.

schema.description:
This is a no-op schema field that may be present in the markup for syntax
 checking.
